DOC.brief_summary: This open-Label , A Randomized , Crossover study evaluate safety pharmacokinetic interaction oral concomitant administration Dutasteride Tadalafil healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigate Pharmacokinetic Drug Interactions Between Dutasteride Tadalafil Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Age 19 45 year BMI score 19 kg/m2 28 kg/m2 SBP < 140 mmHg ≤ 90 mmHg DBP < 90 mmHg ≥ 50 mmHg Eligible accord laboratory result hematology , blood chemistry urinalysis Voluntarily sign informed consent form Gastrointestinal diseases surgery may affect absorption investigational product within 6 month History hypersensitivity History Cardiovascular disease History degenerative Retina disease Lactose intolerance History vision loss Clinically significant disorder allergy , drug hypersensitivity reaction , hepatobiliary system , kidney , neurology , respiratory , hematooncology , endocrine , dermatology , urology , ophthalmology , psychiatry , musculoskeletal system , immunology , otorhinolaryngology , cardiovascular system Donated whole blood ( transfusion , apheresis etc.. ) within 60 day Participated administered investigational product clinical trial within 90 day Taking drug may affect Clinical trial within 30 day Excessive alcohol consumption ( > 3 units/week , 1 unit ) Taking food may affect Clinical trial within 7 day Positive result Urinary test , Serum test Not eligible due reason include laboratory result Clinically significant disorder result Electrocardiography test Not eligible due investigator 's judgment
